parameters:
\N<Luda Soldier>This is a facility managed by us of Luda. It is not a place
where you can freely enter.
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1
air05
air08
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■Event■>

\N<Luda Soldier>Halt, where do you think you're going? You can't enter the
ruins ahead without official permission.
I want to enter the ruins.
I don't have any particular business.
遺跡内へ入りたい

\N<Segi>I intend to enter the ruins. I've heard that all who
participate in the Training Assembly train themselves here.

\N<Luda Soldier>You, a warrior participating in the Training Assembly? Then
you must be well aware of the regulations for entering the
ruins. You should have been informed by Lord Zuuteruka
beforehand.
\N<Segi>Regulations for entry...?

\N<Luda Soldier>Exactly. It's a necessary measure. The ruins are a den of
dangerous and ferocious monsters. If you plan to step
inside, you must be properly prepared.

\N<Luda Soldier>Moreover... if it's someone as frail as you, a woman, then
it's all the more reason.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Luda Soldier>Ah, I see, you're that female warrior. The one who's
participating in the Training Assembly to obtain a pardon
for her husband, who became a criminal...
\N<Segi>My husband is... not a criminal.

\N<Luda Soldier>Hmph, then all the more you should know, right? For the
matches and entry into the ruins, you must wear appropriate
attire and prepare the designated weapons provided by us
Ludas.
\N<Segi>Appropriate attire...
\N<Luda Soldier>...Is there a problem? Are you going to give up on entering?
\N<Segi>That is...

\N<Luda Soldier>Whether you enter the ruins to train yourself before facing
the Training Assembly, or go into battle as you are now,
it's up to you.

\N<Luda Soldier>Whichever path you choose, we will not force you. But if you
decide to enter, go to the office and get the appropriate
preparations done.
\N<Segi>...
DW_目標設定 Acquire_the_Luda_attire_for_entering_the_ruins.
A
特に用事は無い

\N<Luda Soldier>If you wish to enter the lakebed ruins, then go to the
guardhouse and prepare accordingly.

\N<Luda Soldier>Hmm... It seems you have donned the attire as instructed.
Then I shall permit your entry into the ruins... heh.

\N<Luda Soldier>Hmm... It seems you have donned the attire as instructed.
Then I shall permit your entry into the ruins... heh.

\N<Luda Soldier>If you wish to enter the lakebed ruins, then go to the
guardhouse and prepare accordingly.

\N<Luda Soldier>Hmm... It seems you have donned the attire as instructed.
Then I shall permit your entry into the ruins... heh.

\N<Luda Soldier>Hmm... It seems you have donned the attire as instructed.
Then I shall permit your entry into the ruins... heh.

\N<Luda Soldier>The appraisal facility is closed. If you wish to enter the
ruins, make sure to obtain official permission.
